main.name: Yifeng Zhang
main.description: I am currently studying computer science at University of California, San Diego. Personally, I am keen on the recommender system and deep reinforcement learning
main.bio: I am currently studying computer science at University of California, San Diego. Personally, I am keen on the recommender system and deep reinforcement learning.

education.degree: B.S. in Computer Science, Minor in Mathematics

education.school: High School Attached to Shanghai Normal University

work.title: Summer Intern
work.description: Collected financial data and files from the database of the customer company. Processed millions of financial data with python pandas and excel. Received “Exceed Expectation” review from Accountant in Charge.

work.title: Academic Tutor
work.description: Attended weekly lectures and staff meetings. Helped students with their programming assignments during lab hours. Proctored and graded students’ midterm and final exams.

work.title: Outreach Director
work.description: Did business negotiation with local 50+ businesses including Chase and Verizon. Managed 20 people in outreach department and held weekly meetings.

work.company: Furnitrade, a Web App for Used Furniture Trading
work.title: Senior System Analyst
work.description: Worked in an agile student team to develop a web app for students to trade used furniture. Worked as the senior system analyst and developed the website with Flask framework. Implemented APIs with MongoDB database and tested them using Postman ADE. Implemented the frontend with React, javascript and CSS.

work.company: Recommender System on Amazon and Rent The Runway Datasets
work.title: Data Engineer
work.description: Combined logistic regressions and support vector machines to build category classifier on Amazon's 200,000 trading data, ranked 2nd out of 700 on Kaggle. Used tf-idf weighting to do natural language processing on Rent The Runway's customers' reviews. Collaborated filtering algorithms to do purchase predictions based on customers' purchasing history.

work.title: Algorithm Engineer
work.description: Implemented DFS, BFS, UCS, A star algorithms for path search with python and C++. Implemented AI on playing game 2048 with alpha-beta pruning and optimized reward function. Implemented Monte Carlo Tree Search algorithm on the game Gomoku. Implemented Monte Carlo Evaluation, Temporal Difference and Q-learning on the game blackjack. Implemented constraint solving algorithms and a CNF converter to solve sudoku with SAT Solvers.

work.title: Computer Engineer
work.description: Programmed a robot car to discover surrounding environment freely with different sensors. Designed the motion trail of the robot car to draw number 0 to 9 on paper with C++ language. Developed the game 2048 with java and implemented the GUI with JavaFX.

projects.title: FTP
projects.category: Furnitrade, a Web App for Used Furniture Trading

projects.title: 2048 AI Player
projects.category: The AI player for 2048 who can always reach a 4096 tile

projects.title: Recommender System
projects.category: Combined logistic regressions and support vector machines to build a recommender system

testimonials.text: 非淡泊无以明志，非宁静无以致远
学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆
